title: Marigold-DC: Zero-Shot Monocular Depth Completion with Guided Diffusion
details: M Viola, K Qu, N Metzger, B Ke, A Becker, K Schindler… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Depth completion upgrades sparse depth measurements into dense depth maps guided by a conventional image. Existing methods for this highly ill-posed task operate in tightly constrained settings and tend to struggle when applied to images …
